metadata.title: Qoint - Budget Tracker
metadata.description: Manage your budget easily and smartly

dashboard.heroTitle: Manage your budget easily and smartly
dashboard.heroDescription: Track income and expenses with Qoint, set budgets by category, and achieve your financial goals.
dashboard.presetTitle: Pick your job to set default budgets
dashboard.presetApplyError: An error occurred while applying the preset.
dashboard.realtimeAnalysisDesc: See your spending by category at a glance and check budget usage in real time.
dashboard.goalSettingDesc: Set monthly budget goals and track your progress to achieve your financial plans.
dashboard.quickInputDesc: Quickly record transactions and batch-register fixed expenses with an easy interface.

quickActions.addTransactionDesc: Record a new income or expense

budget.title: Budget
budget.noBudget: No budget set for {month}. Click "+ Add new budget" to set up your budget.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: View all income and expense records
transactions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?

transactionForm.title: Add new transaction
transactionForm.quickTipDesc: Selecting the right category helps you see more accurate analysis on the budget page.

fixedExpenses.title: Batch Create Fixed Expenses
fixedExpenses.description: Register recurring monthly expenses at once
fixedExpenses.whatIsDesc: Automatically generate recurring expenses (e.g., subscriptions, insurance, phone bills) for a selected period.
fixedExpenses.tip1: Select a year and month range to generate transactions for the desired period
fixedExpenses.tip2: Set the day of month between 1 and 31
fixedExpenses.tip3: Generated transactions can be individually edited or deleted on the transactions page
fixedExpenses.presetGuideDesc: You can edit the dashboard preset sample data all at once in the file below.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Track your actual costs and next payment dates based on price and number of users.
subscriptions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this subscription?
subscriptions.validationDefaultPrice: Default price must be a number 0 or greater.
subscriptions.validationActualPrice: Actual price must be a number 0 or greater.
subscriptions.validationParticipant: Number of users must be 1 or greater.
subscriptions.validationStartDate: Please enter a billing start date.
subscriptions.validationCustomCycle: Custom cycle months must be 1 or greater.
subscriptions.validationEndDate: End date must be on or after the billing start date.

analysis.title: Annual Analysis
analysis.description: Analyze your income and expenses by year

settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDesc: Choose your display theme. Follow system settings or select manually.
settings.backupDesc: Download all transaction and budget data as a JSON file. Back up regularly before browser data is cleared.
settings.restoreDesc: Upload a backup file to restore your data.
settings.replaceModeDesc: Delete all existing data and replace with backup file
settings.mergeModeDesc: Keep existing data and add/update from backup file
settings.resetAlertsDesc: Reset all 90% budget alerts. You will receive alerts again.
settings.caution1: Replace mode completely deletes current data
settings.caution2: Merge mode overwrites data with matching ID/month from the backup file
settings.caution3: Keep backup files in a safe location
settings.caution4: Use backup files to transfer data when moving to another device
settings.filePersistError: If the problem persists, check if the backup file is corrupted.

login.title: Login
login.description: Sign in with Google to use your budget data.
